ValidationRule.description: DEPRECATED - If payment terms is credit card then the account needs to have a valid credit status
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( ISPICKVAL(Payment_Terms__c, 'Credit Card'), OR ( ISPICKVAL(Bill_To_Account__r.Credit_Status__c, ''), ISPICKVAL(Bill_To_Account__r.Credit_Status__c, 'Purchase Order'), ISPICKVAL(Bill_To_Account__r.Credit_Status__c, 'PO wBackup Credit Card') ), SBQQ__Ordered__c = TRUE )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: DEPRECATED - Orders with a payment term of credit card requires the primary bill to account to have a valid credit status
